name: iPuzzleSolver Lite
description:
The Ultimate Compilation of Classic Puzzle Games.
Includes popular games like Sudoku, MasterMind, PictureCross (also known as Japanese crossword), Solitaire, MineSweeper, Shangai (also known as Mah-Jong) and Tectonic (also known as Suguru).
Want to get rid of the adverts? Buy the full version of iPuzzleSolver.
